intro.title: BDSM Psychological Test and Sexual Orientation Spectrum
intro.description: Scientifically quantify your psychological dimensions and sexual orientation spectrum. All data is stored locally, no login required, 18+ available.

consent.title: Age and Privacy Confirmation
consent.description: This test is for self-exploration purposes only, for entertainment/reference, and does not constitute any diagnostic or therapeutic advice.
consent.privacy_check_prefix: I have read and agree to the
consent.privacy_check_suffix: , and test data is stored locally encrypted.

run.incomplete_dialog_message:
You have only completed {percentage}% of the questions. This will affect the accuracy of your test results.
We recommend completing all questions to get more accurate test results.

result.title: Test Results
result.disclaimer: Note: These results are for entertainment/reference only and do not constitute any professional diagnosis or advice.
result.principle: Consent, Safety, Rationality: Always prioritize full communication, clear boundaries, and respect for others in any exploration.

dimension.dominance_desc: Preference and comfort level with dominant roles
dimension.submission_desc: Preference and comfort level with submissive roles
dimension.switch_desc: Willingness to switch roles depending on context and partner

question.q1: In intimate interactions, I prefer to control the pace and make decisions.
question.q2: Clear guidance and instructions help me relax and engage more.
question.q3: Depending on context and partner, I might switch between dominant and submissive roles.
question.q4: I enjoy setting rules and boundaries and having the other party follow them.
question.q5: Following arrangements from the other party gives me more sense of security.

result.title: Test Results
result.disclaimer: These test results are for reference only and do not constitute any medical or psychological advice.
result.no_history_description: After completing the test, your results will be saved here.
result.clear_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all history records? This action cannot be undone.
result.principle: Privacy Principle: All data is stored locally only and will not be uploaded to the server.
result.email_share_body_intro:
Hello,

I would like to share my test results with you:
result.email_share_note: Note: Please visit the test page to view full results.
result.email_share_footer: These test results are for reference only and do not constitute any medical or psychological advice.
result.low_progress_message: Your current progress is {percentage}%. To get accurate test results, we recommend completing at least 10% of the questions.
result.incomplete_progress_message: Your current progress is {percentage}%. To get more accurate test results, we recommend completing all questions.
result.no_result_message: You haven't completed the test yet. Please complete the test first to view results.
result.clear_all_data_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all data? This action cannot be undone.
result.download_pdf_hint: Please use the browser's print function to save as PDF
result.download_profile_success: Please use the browser's print function to save as PDF
result.history_count_message: You have {count} history records. Click on a record below to view results:
result.no_result_message: You haven't completed the test yet, or the test results haven't loaded.
result.export_simplified_message: Visit {siteUrl} to view the complete analysis and detailed results.

data_storage.title: Data Storage
data_storage.content: All data in this application is stored only on your local device (browser localStorage) using encrypted storage. We do not collect, upload, or store any personal information on the server.

anonymous_testing.title: Anonymous Testing
anonymous_testing.content: All test results are processed anonymously and are not associated with any personal identification information. You can freely choose to share test results, and share links only contain test result data, not any personal information.

data_security.title: Data Security
data_security.content: We use AES encryption algorithm to encrypt locally stored data to ensure data security. Encryption keys are stored only locally and are not uploaded to the server.

gdpr_compliance.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr_compliance.content: This application fully complies with GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) requirements:

data_minimization.label: Data Minimization
data_minimization.text: Only store basic data required for testing, and do not collect any unnecessary personal information

data_subject_rights.label: Data Subject Rights
data_subject_rights.text: You can access, modify, or delete local data at any time

data_portability.label: Data Portability
data_portability.text: Support exporting test results (PDF, PNG, JSON formats)

right_to_erasure.label: Right to Erasure
right_to_erasure.text: Support one-click clearing of all local data, including test results, history records, and share links

data_protection.label: Data Protection
data_protection.text: All local data is encrypted to ensure data security

anonymity.label: Anonymity
anonymity.text: All test results are processed anonymously and are not associated with any personal identification information

how_to_clear.label: How to Clear Data
how_to_clear.text: On the test results page, you can click the "Clear All Data (GDPR Compliant)" button, which will delete all locally stored test data.

how_to_export.label: How to Export Data
how_to_export.text: On the test results page, you can click the "Export JSON" button to download a JSON file containing complete test results.

third_party_services.title: Third-Party Services
third_party_services.content: This application does not use any third-party analytics or tracking services and does not share any data with third parties.

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through the feedback function in the application.
